It was great to meet with him before hand. #HoustonStrong http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df10D88VMAAiPBr.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df10D6aU0AAhGci.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df10D86VAAAkDeV.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df10D6XVQAIfHF9.jpg

This senseless violence must end—Congress must pass sensible gun legislation. https://www.cnn.com/2018/06/17/us/new-jersey-art-festival-shooting/index.html

RT @jorge_aguilarDC Republicans want to gut Medicare, rob children of their health insurance, and are currently hoping you are too distracted by what Trump is tweeting about to notice they’re trying to undo protections for more than 130 million Americans with pre-existing conditions.

As many of us spend the day celebrating our fathers and father-figures, we know there are potentially thousands of fathers who won’t be spending Father’s Day with their children because of the human rights abuses that are happening at our southern border. #KeepFamiliesTogether http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1008374168184762371/img/7n3SrF3ULbpqwyUg.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1008374168184762371/vid/180x320/srHyAASwGXk9vxW9.mp4?tag=2
RT @SInow Ted Cruz may be Grayson Allen's doppelgänger, but can he actually hoop? https://trib.al/cDia89A
To my husband and best friend, and to all the fathers and father-figures — Happy Father’s Day! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df6Mv49VMAA2GrU.jpg

Kids across the US are spending today with their dads. But thousands of children who have been separated from their parents by the Trump Admin don’t have that option. Make this a #FathersDayOfAction & join our fight to reunite these families. Ask your senators to support S.3036. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df6QgnYU8AAVYYQ.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df6QgnXUYAEbcKb.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df6QgnXU8AAcoT4.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/Df6QgnYVQAEt9lJ.jpg
Make no mistake — this Administration is abdicating our country’s moral leadership. http://thehill.com/policy/international/392418-us-expected-to-withdraw-from-un-human-rights-council-report

For decades, our country has opened our doors to the most vulnerable who are fleeing violence and oppression. We are better than this.
https://www.thecut.com/2018/06/immigration-asylum-domestic-gang-violence-jeff-sessions.html
Mis oraciones estan con el pueblo de #Colombia, quienes hoy democráticamente eligen a su futuro presidente en la segunda vuelta. #ColombiaDecide
My prayers are with the people of #Colombia, who today democratically elect their future president in the second round of elections. #ColombiaDecide

As we celebrate Father’s Day and continue to celebrate #Pride Month, let’s recognize that LGBTQ rights, including those of parents, continue to be undermined by this Administration and in states across the country. We must stand together to fight back.
https://www.usatoday.com/story/news/nation/2018/06/04/same-sex-marriage-ruling-undermined-gay-parents/650112002/

Congratulations to @IvanDuque, the new President-elect of the Republic of Colombia. Today, is a historic day for #Colombia as they democratically elected a woman, @mluciaramirez, as Vice President of the nation.
